column6: HEL HATH A NEW FURY. Stolen from ASGARD, exiled from HEVEN, and robbed of SERA, her greatest companion - ANGELA plunges into the depths of blackest HEL to save her friend...and once there, the lost princess of Asgard will carve out a realm of her very own. All hail ANGELA, THE NEW QUEEN OF HEL!
column8: | writer:Marguerite Bennett | artist:Stephanie Hans | artist:Aaron Kim Jacinto | penciller (cover):Julian Totino Tedesco
